CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 23, 1961, p.16, reads: "LOENDI WEEK FORMAL - As a fitting climax to the second annual Loendi Club Week, a gay formal was held last Saturday at the beautiful club, featuring the music of Bobby Jones. in photo on the left is a group of Loendians and their wives, who worked hard to make the week of merrymaking a success.  Seated around the table are, left to right: Mrs. Otto Simonson, Alvin Busey, Mrs. John Burton, Mrs. H.B. Corsey, Wesley Lee, Mrs. H.B. Corsey, Roland Sawyer, president; Mrs. Sawyer, Mrs. Howard Hairson, Mrs. Frank Stotts, Mrs. Walter Rainey and Walter Rainey.  Standing: Otto Simonson, Gadson Green, Mrs. Gadson Green, John Burton, Dr. C.C. Blow, Mrs. Fred Gladney, Fred Gladney, Frank Stotts and Howard Hairston..." -- Harris Photos
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, seated from left: Mrs. Simonson, Alvin Busey, Mrs. John Burton, H. B. Corsey, Wesley Lee, Mrs. H. B. Corsey, Roland Sawyer, Aileen Eckstein Sawyer, Mrs. Howard Hairson, Mrs. Stotts, Mrs. Rainey and Walter Rainey; standing: Otto Simonson, Gadson Green, Mrs. Green, John Burton, Dr. C. C. Blow, Mrs. Gladney, Fred Gladney, Frank Stotts, and Howard Hairston, gathered for Loendi Week formal, in Loendi Club
